description:
A soft tee that’s welcome after a day in neoprene, or business casual. As part of Patagonia’s Responsibili-Tee® line, this shirt is made from recycled bottles and scrap fabrics. By repurposing materials less water is used during manufacturing, and it keeps scraps out of the world's landfills and incinerators.

  • Made using 118g of recycled scrap fabric and 4.8 recycled plastic bottles
  • Responsibili-Tee® recycling process uses 96% less water and creates 45% less CO2 per unit than conventional cotton T-shirt production
  • Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retention
  • Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: Patagonia Fitz Roy Horizons Responsibili-Tee - Men's
